title: PVP PATCHER
body: So i've been trying to install the game and every time i get past the set up wizard and the game logo pops up, it shows a loading screen under it which never progresses and after waiting I get a notification saying 'Pvp Patcher Kernal has stopped working'. What do i do? Help please.

replies.body: Most of the time that patcher kernel error can be fixed by double checking that your OS has all of the correct [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in place to allow League to run correctly. Run through the steps in that guide, and hit me back up if you're still having any problems ^_^!

I went through all of those and now its giving me a RADS error. Its basically the first time im installing the game so i dont have the files the people are using to fix the error. What do i do? I havent gone further than the set up wizard.
Ahhh since this is the first time you're installing, make sure that you're running the installer as administrator.
Nothing happened :( Rads error still showing.

Well snap. Reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to walk you through a few more steps to get that installer finally going.
It got fixed :D I reinstalled the Set Up Wizard and it worked.
